name: BMW X5 M – 2022
description: This powerful BMW X5 M delivers exceptional performance with a luxurious interior. It features advanced safety technology, a spacious cabin, and has been meticulously maintained with service records available.

name: Tesla Model S Plaid – 2023
description: Brand new Tesla Model S Plaid with futuristic performance, full self-driving capability, and a minimalistic high-tech interior. One of the fastest production cars available today.

name: Audi Q7 Premium – 2021
description: Audi Q7 combines performance with comfort and safety. It features Quattro all-wheel drive, a premium interior, and advanced infotainment for the whole family.

name: Ford Mustang GT – 2020
description: A modern American muscle car with raw power and classic styling. This GT version comes with upgraded brakes, sport suspension, and a throaty V8.

name: Hyundai Ioniq 5 – 2023
description: Award-winning electric SUV with bold styling, ultra-fast charging, and roomy interior. Perfect for urban commuting and long road trips alike.

name: Toyota Land Cruiser – 2019
description: Legendary off-road capability with luxury and comfort. This Land Cruiser is in excellent shape and ready for both highway and trail adventures.

name: Chevrolet Camaro ZL1 – 2021
description: Track-ready performance with aggressive styling and a supercharged V8 engine. This ZL1 edition includes Recaro seats and magnetic ride control.

name: Mercedes GLE 450 – 2022
description: Combining power with sophistication, the GLE 450 offers mild hybrid efficiency, luxurious tech-filled cabin, and air suspension for ultra-smooth ride.

name: Honda Civic Type R – 2020
description: High-performance hatchback with sharp handling, turbocharged power, and racing DNA. Well-maintained with full service history.

name: Porsche Taycan Turbo – 2022
description: Luxury meets innovation with this all-electric Porsche Taycan Turbo. Blistering acceleration and high-end design with every modern comfort included.

name: Nissan Patrol Safari – 2018
description: Off-road beast with a solid frame, though it has some body damage. Perfect for rebuild or parts. 4x4 works great, engine in running condition.
